ygData.subject: How much will you pay to play?
ygData.msgSnippet: My previous post touched on this. I have thought about it a bit. We pay less than $200 a year just to play. Not bad. I spent at least $500 on GamesWorkshop
ygData.messageBody:
My previous post touched on this. I have thought about it a bit. We
pay less than $200 a year just to play. Not bad. I spent at least
$500 on GamesWorkshop products each year when I was more active
there.

I don't have a problem dropping the monthly fee. It is quite
reasonable. I might be able to dump another $500 a year into
upgrades. Unfortunately, my machine is now pretty much maxed. So I
must hope that I can hold out at the present level long enough to get
together the funds for a more upgradeable tower.

How much are others willing to pay to play?

Barto Proudfoot
